title: For those who reject the rulings of Allah | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: whenever you start using your logic against the aura no reason you lose because you may succeed in 90% 95% in finding the logic and the wisdom behind such verdict but those you miss or those you could not find the logic and wisdom behind them would be attached to you and if you do not comply and say I will believe in obey allah azza wajal you lose the test
